name: Pro Pinball\u00ae: Revived & Remastered
blurb: Legend Pat Lawlor and Pro Pinball\u00ae join forces to redefine the state of the art and create the ultimate pinball game.

rewards.reward: INSERT COIN! Exclusive access to Kickstarter only updates and comments with our thanks.
BONUS MULTIPLIER! Digital downloads of the original PC versions of the award winning Timeshock! AND Fantastic Journey. That's only $1 per table! This reward is included in all higher tiers too.

TOUCH START! Digital download of Pat Lawlor's ultimate new Pro Pinball table for iOS or Android (including OUYA & Kindle Fire), thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of the new table, and a special ONE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts.

PRESS START! Digital download of Pat Lawlor's ultimate new Pro Pinball table for the platform of your choice, thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of the new table, and a special ONE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts.

TOUCH ESSENTIAL COMBO! Digital downloads of all FIVE tables for iOS or Android (including OUYA & Kindle Fire), thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of all the tables, and a special ONE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts.

SHOOT AGAIN! Digital downloads of Pat Lawlor's ultimate new Pro Pinball table on TWO platforms of your choice, thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of the new table, and a special ONE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts.

ESSENTIAL COMBO! Digital downloads of all FIVE tables on the platform of your choice, thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of all the tables, and a special ONE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts.

TOUCH COMBO! Digital downloads of all FIVE tables for iOS or Android (including OUYA & Kindle Fire), digital downloads of the soundtrack for all five tables, PDFs of the operator's manual for all five tables, thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of all the tables, a special TWO Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and access to an exclusive VIP Kickstarter Pro Pinball forum section featuring developer diaries and special previews.

COMBO! Digital downloads of all FIVE tables on the platform of your choice, digital downloads of the soundtrack for all five tables, PDFs of the operator's manual for all five tables, thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of all the tables, a special TWO Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and access to an exclusive VIP Kickstarter Pro Pinball forum section featuring developer diaries and special previews.

DOUBLE COMBO! Digital downloads of all FIVE tables for TWO platforms of your choice, digital downloads of the soundtrack for all five tables, PDFs of the operator's manual for all five tables,  thanks on the Pro Pinball website, exclusive high resolution wallpapers of all the tables, a special TWO Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and access to an exclusive VIP Kickstarter Pro Pinball forum section featuring developer diaries and special previews.

EXTRA BALL! A large boxed copy of Pat Lawlor's ultimate new Pro Pinball table for PC AND Mac (exclusive to Kickstarter and DRM free), a printed operator's manual, a Pro Pinball Key Ring, your chance to VOTE on the theme for the new table, a special THREE Star insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and EVERYTHING in the previous reward tier!

SKILL SHOT! Glass-Off mode for the new table, BETA access to the new table, thanks in the game credits, a special THREE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and ALL previous reward tiers!

JACKPOT! Your boxed copy of the new Pro Pinball table gets signed by Pat Lawlor himself, an exclusive BRONZE Pro Pinball badge, a Pro Pinball Backer T-Shirt, BETA access to the new table, Glass-Off mode for the new table, thanks in the game credits, a special FOUR Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and ALL previous reward tiers!

MULTIBALL! You now get all four remastered original tables boxed and signed by the entire team for PC AND Mac (exclusive to Kickstarter and DRM free) to go with your boxed and signed new table, an exclusive SILVER Pro Pinball badge, posters of all five tables, BETA access to all tables, Glass-Off mode for all tables, thanks in the game credits, a special FIVE Star Kickstarter insignia next to your leaderboard entries and forum posts, and ALL previous reward tiers!

VIDEO MODE! Work with our design team to create a unique dot-matrix animation of your choosing for the table of your choice, your initials in one of the high score tables, an exclusive GOLD Pro Pinball badge, and ALL previous reward tiers!

REPLAY! A signed hand drawn portrait of yourself by John Youssi, a one of a kind work-in-progress CAD drawing of the new table signed by Pat Lawlor, signed boxed copies of every future Pro Pinball game we make, digital downloads of every future Pro Pinball game on every platform we support, special thanks in the game credits, and ALL previous reward tiers!

SPECIAL! Your portrait now appears in the backglass artwork for the new table drawn by John Youssi, a signed high quality print of the backglass featuring your portrait, and ALL previous reward tiers!

ULTRA JACKPOT! A special lunch with Pat Lawlor, John Youssi and Adrian Barritt in Chicago (the home of pinball), special thanks on all FIVE playfields, and ALL previous reward tiers! (You must arrange your own travel to Chicago, IL)
